doc:
Lizzie Evans https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lizzie_Evans 0 Lizzie Evans was an entertainer in vaudeville and musical theatre in New York City and Chicago, Illinois, from the 1880s into the 20th century. A New York Times article described her as "a bright little person of the Lotta Crabtree physique and school, but with less naturalness and more nasal twang". Lizzie_Evans was an_entertainer in vaudeville and musical_theatre in New_York_City and Chicago , Illinois , from the_1880s into the_20th_century . A_New_York_Times_article described her as " a_bright_little_person of the_Lotta_Crabtree_physique_and_school , but with less_naturalness and more_nasal_twang_" .
